title: Once and for all we're gonna tell you who we are so shut up and listen
abstract: Once And For All We’re Gonna Tell You Who We Are So Shut Up And Listen is a theatre play by the company Ontroerend Goed, made by adolescents. On their world tour the youngsters took 20.091 photos with all kinds of cameras. The book contains a selection of these pictures, brought together in a graphic story that talks about the life of youngsters: their obsessions, highs and lows, their changing bodies… The publication gives a picture of the theme of the play without being a literal illustration of it. In the printing process the color magenta was replaced by lurid pink.
historic_collection: Associated Faculty of the Arts - miscellaneous;51267690
book_title: Once and for all we're gonna tell you who we are so shut up and listen
